oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1937: Receiving checks for flood work.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 1937 flood; WPA; floods; Mississippi River; employment; finance;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A lengthy line of people are waiting to receive payment, in the form of checks, for their work with the flood.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Caradine, Kathleen West
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor:
Photos by Beardsley, Hugh L.
Typing by Derryberry, Eugenia
